goal: IT systems for transport and logistics, comprehensive and flexible software development, implementation, research and innovation activities, consultancy. Numerous tailor-made components, full range of accompanying services. OLTIS Group is a Czech private group of specialized software companies with close and effective cooperation since 1993. The main development background is based in the Czech Republic, with own subsidiaries in Slovakia, Poland and Hungary. More than 600 customers in 25 European countries: railway undertakings, operators and infrastructure  managers, freight forwarders, carriers, shippers, universities, international associations and organizations etc.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
